com.percussion.loader.objectstore
Class PSLoaderComponent

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.loader.objectstore.PSLoaderComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSItemContext, com.percussion.loader.objectstore.PSLoaderNamedComponent
public abstract class PSLoaderComponent
extends Object
implements Cloneable

The PSLoaderComponent (abstract) class defines required public methods for all component level object store objects. It also contains helper methods.

Method Detail

toXml

public abstract Element toXml(Document doc)
This method is called to create an XML element node with the appropriate format for the given object. An element node may contain a hierarchical structure, including child objects. The element node can also be a child of another element node.

Parameters:
doc - The document to use to create the element, may not be null.
Returns:
the newly created XML element node, never null
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if doc is null.

fromXml

public abstract void fromXml(Element sourceNode)
                      throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException,
                             com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException
This method is called to populate an object from its XML representation. An element node may contain a hierarchical structure, including child objects. The element node can also be a child of another element node.

Parameters:
sourceNode - the XML element node to populate from not null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the XML element node does not represent a type supported by the class.
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if any other error occurs.

copyFrom

public void copyFrom(Object obj)
Copy or clone the object from another object. This is not a supported operation unless override by derived classes. This signature made it possible to support the copyFrom method in the future.

Parameters:
obj - The to be copied or cloned object.

getRequiredAttribute

public static String getRequiredAttribute(Element source,
                                          String attName)
                                   throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Utility method to get a required attibute value, validating that it is not null or empty.

Parameters:
source - Element to get the attribute from, may not be null.
attName - The name of the attribute to get, may not be null or empty
Returns:
The attribute value, never null or empty.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - If the specified attribute cannot be found with a non-empty value.

getNextRequiredElement

public static Element getNextRequiredElement(PSXmlTreeWalker tree,
                                             String nodeName,
                                             int flags)
                                      throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Get next element from the tree and flags, validating the parameters and the retrieved element that it is not null.

Parameters:
tree - The tree to get the next element from, may not be null.
nodeName - The expected XML node name, may not be null or empty.
flags - The appropriate PSXmlTreeWalker.GET_NEXT_xxx flags.
Returns:
The retrieved and validated element, never null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if there is an invalid parameters.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if fail to retrieve next element from the tree.

validateElement

protected void validateElement(Element sourceNode,
                               String xmlNodeName)
                        throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Validating a XML element.

Parameters:
sourceNode - The to be validated XML element, may not be null
xmlNodeName - The expected XML node name, may not be null or empty
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the XML node of element is not xmlNodeName.
IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid.
